meanings.definition: A colorless, pungent, crystalline compound found in chili peppers.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a pinch of capsicin to the spicy curry.
meanings.sent2: Chili peppers contain capsicin, which gives them their heat.
meanings.sent3: The capsicin in the chili pepper danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The capsicin in the curry ignited a fiery explosion of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The capsicin crystals sparkled like tiny fire gems in the pepper.

meanings.definition: A substance that produces a burning sensation on the skin and mucous membranes.
meanings.sent1: After cutting chili peppers, wash your hands to avoid the burning sensation from capsicin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a cream containing capsicin to relieve the burning sensation.
meanings.sent3: The capsicin in the lotion made my skin feel like it was on fire, but in a good way.
meanings.sent4: The capsicin in the ointment worked like a fiery shield against pain.
meanings.sent5: The capsicin cream felt like a warm hug that turned into a gentle burn.
